name: stamina
effect: Raises this Pokémon's Defense by one stage when it takes damage from a move.
short_effect: Raises this Pokémon's Defense by one stage when it takes damage from a move.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon: Boosts the Defense stat when hit by an attack.
